description: This file is a test utility module for rendering React components within a Memory Router context in tests. It simplifies testing of routed components by avoiding BrowserRouter limitations, managing React Router future flags, and providing a consistent rendering setup.

methods.name: renderWithRouter( element, { initialEntries = ["/"],  routes, } = {} )
methods.description: A utility function to render React components wrapped in a Memory Router for testing purposes, with configurable initial entries and optional routes. It returns the rendered result along with the router instance.
